languages.text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... И я схожу с ума, {name}. Я думала, что смогу обуздать эту силу, но теперь... Вы должны покончить с этим. Ради меня, ради себя... И ради всего, что было между нами. Если это сделаете вы, я... буду совсем не против". {n}Кассия закрывает глаза, не в силах встретиться с вами взглядом. И на секунду одолевающая ее дрожь затихает — как в ожидании занесенного топора палача замирает смиренная жертва.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... И я схожу с ума, {name}. Я думала, что смогу обуздать эту силу, но теперь... Вы должны покончить с этим. Ради меня, ради себя... И ради всего, что было между нами. Если это сделаете вы, я... буду совсем не против". {n}Кассия закрывает глаза, не в силах встретиться с вами взглядом. И на секунду одолевающая ее дрожь затихает — как в ожидании занесенного топора палача замирает смиренная жертва.{/n}

languages.text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going barmy, {name}. I thought I could harness this power, but now... You must end this. For my sake, for your own... and for that of all that we have shared. If you do this, I... I shan't object at all." {n}Cassia closes her eyes, unable to bring herself to meet your gaze. Her tremors subside for a brief moment, like a resigned victim going still in anticipation of the executioner's axe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Когда капсула открылась, мой разум потонул в грязно-алом, и буром, и черном, и... И я схожу с ума, {name}. Я думала, что смогу обуздать эту силу, но теперь... Вы должны покончить с этим. Ради меня, ради себя... И ради всего, что было между нами. Если это сделаете вы, я... буду совсем не против". {n}Кассия закрывает глаза, не в силах встретиться с вами взглядом. И на секунду одолевающая ее дрожь затихает — как в ожидании занесенного топора палача замирает смиренная жертва.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going mad, {name}. I thought I could harness this power, but now... You must end this. For my sake, for your own... and for that of all that we have shared. If you do this, I... I shan't object at all." {n}Cassia closes her eyes, unable bring herself to meet your gaze. Her tremors quieten for a moment, like a humble victim that goes still in anticipation of the descent of the executioner's axe.{/n}

"When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going barmy, {name}. I thought I could harness this power, but now... You must end this. For my sake, for your own... and for that of all that we have shared. If you do this, I... I shan't object at all." {n}Cassia closes her eyes, unable to bring herself to meet your gaze. Her tremors subside for a brief moment, like a resigned victim going still in anticipation of the executioner's axe.{/n}

languages.text: 「カプセルが開くと、私の心は緋色、琥珀色、そして黒の薄汚れた色合いに溺れました…気が狂ってしまいそうです、{name}。この力を利用できると思ったのに…あなたが止めてください。私のためにも、あなた自身のためにも…そして私たちが分かち合ってきたすべてのもののためにも。そうしてくれるなら、私は…受け入れます」{n}カシアは目を閉じた。あなたの視線を受け止めることができないのだ。彼女の震えは、まるで処刑者の斧が振り下ろされるのを予期して静止する犠牲者のように、一瞬おさまる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going barmy, {name}. I thought I could harness this power, but now... You must end this. For my sake, for your own... and for that of all that we have shared. If you do this, I... I shan't object at all." {n}Cassia closes her eyes, unable to bring herself to meet your gaze. Her tremors subside for a brief moment, like a resigned victim going still in anticipation of the executioner's axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「カプセルが開くと、私の心は緋色、琥珀色、そして黒の薄汚れた色合いに溺れました…気が狂ってしまいそうです、{name}。この力を利用できると思ったのに…あなたが止めてください。私のためにも、あなた自身のためにも…そして私たちが分かち合ってきたすべてのもののためにも。そうしてくれるなら、私は…受け入れます」{n}カシアは目を閉じた。あなたの視線を受け止めることができないのだ。彼女の震えは、まるで処刑者の斧が振り下ろされるのを予期して静止する犠牲者のように、一瞬おさまる。{/n}

languages.text: “当那个胶囊打开的时候，我的脑子里充满了红色和黑色的阴影，我……我要发疯了，{name}。我本以为我能驾驭这股力量，可现在……你必须结束这一切。为了我，为了你自己……也为了我们曾共同有过的一切。如果你打算这么做，我……我一点都不会反对。”{n}卡西娅闭上眼睛，无法再直视你的目光。她的颤抖暂时平息下来，仿佛任命的受害者一动不动，等待刽子手的斧头落下。{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going barmy, {name}. I thought I could harness this power, but now... You must end this. For my sake, for your own... and for that of all that we have shared. If you do this, I... I shan't object at all." {n}Cassia closes her eyes, unable to bring herself to meet your gaze. Her tremors subside for a brief moment, like a resigned victim going still in anticipation of the executioner's axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “当那个胶囊打开的时候，我的脑子里充满了红色和黑色的阴影，我……我要发疯了，{name}。我本以为我能驾驭这股力量，可现在……你必须结束这一切。为了我，为了你自己……也为了我们曾共同有过的一切。如果你打算这么做，我，呃，我一点都不会反对。”{n}卡西娅闭上眼睛，无法再直视你的目光。她的颤抖暂时平息下来，仿佛卑微的受害者一动不动，等待刽子手的斧头落下。{/n}

languages.text: «Cuando la cápsula se abrió, los tonos más sombríos del carmesí, del ámbar y del negro inundaron mi mente, y... Y me estoy volviendo loca, {name}. Pensé que podría controlar este poder, pero ahora... Debe ponerle fin a esto. Por mi bien, por el suyo... y por el de todo lo que hemos compartido. Si lo hace, yo... no pondré ninguna objeción». {n}Cassia cierra los ojos, incapaz de mirarte a los ojos. Sus temblores se detienen por un breve instante, como una víctima resignada espera inmóvil el descenso del hacha del verdugo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going barmy, {name}. I thought I could harness this power, but now... You must end this. For my sake, for your own... and for that of all that we have shared. If you do this, I... I shan't object at all." {n}Cassia closes her eyes, unable to bring herself to meet your gaze. Her tremors subside for a brief moment, like a resigned victim going still in anticipation of the executioner's axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cuando la cápsula se abrió, los tonos más sombríos del carmesí, del ámbar y del negro inundaron mi mente, y... Y me estoy volviendo loca, {name}. Pensé que podría controlar este poder, pero ahora... Debe ponerle fin a esto. Por mi bien, por el suyo... y por el de todo lo que hemos compartido. Si lo hace, yo... no pondré ninguna objeción». {n}Cassia cierra los ojos, incapaz de mirarte a los ojos. Sus temblores se detienen por un breve instante, como una víctima resignada espera inmóvil el descenso del hacha del verdugo.{/n}

languages.text: "Als die Kapsel sich geöffnet hat, wurde mein Verstand mit schmutzigen Schattierungen von Rot und Umbra überflutet und Schwarz und ... Und ich werde verrückt, {name}. Ich dachte, ich könnte diese Kraft bändigen, aber nun ... Ihr müsst dem ein Ende setzen. Für mich, für Euch ... und für alles, was wir geteilt haben. Wenn Ihr das tut, dann ... Werde ich mich nicht beklagen." {n}Cassia schließt die Augen, unfähig, deinem Blick zu begegnen. Ihr Zittern lässt einen kurzen Augenblick lang nach, wie ein demütiges Opfer, das in Erwartung der Axt des Henkers erstarrt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going barmy, {name}. I thought I could harness this power, but now... You must end this. For my sake, for your own... and for that of all that we have shared. If you do this, I... I shan't object at all." {n}Cassia closes her eyes, unable to bring herself to meet your gaze. Her tremors subside for a brief moment, like a resigned victim going still in anticipation of the executioner's axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Als die Kapsel sich geöffnet hat, wurde mein Verstand mit schmutzigen Schattierungen von Rot und Umbra überflutet und Schwarz und ... Und ich werde bekloppt, {name}. Ich dachte, ich könnte diese Kraft bändigen, aber nun ... Ihr müsst dem ein Ende setzen. Für mich, für Euch ... und für alles, was wir geteilt haben. Wenn Ihr das tut, dann, äh, dann beklage ich mich nicht." {n}Cassia schließt die Augen, unfähig, deinem Blick zu begegnen. Ihr Zittern lässt einen kurzen Augenblick lang nach, wie ein demütiges Opfer, das in Erwartung der herabrauschenden Axt des Henkers erstarrt.{/n}

languages.text: « Quand la capsule s'est ouverte, mon esprit était noyé sous des teintes écarlates, ocre, noires et... je perds la tête, {name}. J'ai cru pouvoir maîtriser ce pouvoir, mais maintenant... Il est temps d'en finir. Pour mon bien, pour le vôtre, et au nom de tout ce que nous avons partagé... Si vous allez jusqu'au bout, je... je ne m'y opposerai pas. » {n}Cassia préfère fermer les yeux plutôt que croiser votre regard. Pendant un court instant, elle cesse de trembler, comme une victime résignée qui se figerait au moment où le bourreau abat sa hache.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going barmy, {name}. I thought I could harness this power, but now... You must end this. For my sake, for your own... and for that of all that we have shared. If you do this, I... I shan't object at all." {n}Cassia closes her eyes, unable to bring herself to meet your gaze. Her tremors subside for a brief moment, like a resigned victim going still in anticipation of the executioner's axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quand la capsule s'est ouverte, mon esprit était noyé sous des teintes écarlates, ocre, noires et... je perds la tête, {name}. J'ai cru pouvoir maîtriser ce pouvoir, mais maintenant... Il est temps d'en finir. Pour mon bien, pour le vôtre, et au nom de tout ce que nous avons partagé... Si vous allez jusqu'au bout, je... je ne m'y opposerai pas. » {n}Cassia préfère fermer les yeux plutôt que croiser votre regard. Pendant un court instant, elle cesse de trembler, comme une victime qui se figerait au moment où le bourreau abat sa hache.{/n}

languages.text: "Kapsül açılınca nahoş tonlarda kırmızılar, kahverengiler, siyahlar ve daha neler neler aklımı sardı... Gerçekten de kafayı sıyırdım {name}. Bu güçten faydalanabilirim sanmıştım, oysa şimdi... Buna bir son vermelisin. Hem benim hem de kendi iyiliğin için... Paylaştığımız her şeyin şerefine. Bunu yaparsan... İtiraz etmem." {n}Sana bakacak gücü kendinde bulamayan Cassia, gözlerini kapatıyor. Kaderini kabullenerek celladın baltasını bekleyen kurbanlar misali titremesi azalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "When the capsule opened, my mind was drowned in grimy shades of crimson, and umber, and black, and... And I am going barmy, {name}. I thought I could harness this power, but now... You must end this. For my sake, for your own... and for that of all that we have shared. If you do this, I... I shan't object at all." {n}Cassia closes her eyes, unable to bring herself to meet your gaze. Her tremors subside for a brief moment, like a resigned victim going still in anticipation of the executioner's axe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kapsül açılınca nahoş tonlarda kırmızılar, kahverengiler, siyahlar ve daha neler neler aklımı sardı... Gerçekten de kafayı sıyırdım {name}. Bu güçten faydalanabilirim sanmıştım, oysa şimdi... Artık buna bir son vermelisin. Benim iyiliğim için olduğu kadar kendi iyiliğin için de... Paylaştığımız her şeyin şerefine. Bunu yaparsan... Asla itirazım olmayacak." {n}Cassia, sana bakacak gücü kendinde bulamayarak gözlerini kapatıyor. Kaderini kabullenerek celladın baltasını bekleyen kurbanlar misali, bir anlığına titremesi azalıyor.{/n}
